Body: If I want to describe the action that Text-To-Speech computer software does, what verb should I use? "Pronounce" and "tell" seems like a verb for human action. "Read" may be correct but for software usage it is closer to the "TTS software reads text, then processes it, then ..." then reads again? Seems misleading to use one word for two different actions.
Title: Correct verb for Text-To-Speech software action

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:

I love
